name: Deep Core Data
description:
Since 2014, Deep Core Data has been using technology to improve the lives of business leaders, employees, and consumers. Unlike many other IT providers out there, we believe that hardware and software solutions are not goals, but rather tools to help humans create an effective and meaningful work environment. We make it our mission to provide the education, services, and products you need to feel comfortable and fully in control of your company.
We are based just outside of Boston in Waltham, MA, though we help businesses around the country, as well as internationally.
 
Our Services
On-call and Emergency Support
Technical Support
Ticketing systems, email support, and off-hours staffing
Data Recovery
Emergency response to hacking, ransomware, power outages, and data corruption
Disaster Prevention
Server security, network and power redundancy, disaster and recovery protocols
 
Network and Managed Services
Email and Software Setups
Consolidate and convert your current business technology to enterprise-level suites
Clouding/Unclouding
Backups and secure data transfer
Server Migration and Hosting
Take advantage of our safe and controlled data center storage
 
Effective Workflow Scaling
Process Automation
Data entry, management, and computations
Custom Software Development
From web portals to employee management programs and VPN environments
Database Development & Administration
Get more value from your data with scalable, clean, and intuitive databases
READ MORE...
